item.title: Ultracab (India) Ltd Falls 3.45% Amid Downgrade and Profitability Pressures
item.description: Ultracab (India) Ltd’s stock declined by 3.45% over the week ending 6 February 2026, closing at Rs.7.56, underperforming the Sensex which gained 1.51% during the same period. The week was marked by a new 52-week low, deteriorating financial quality, and a downgrade to a Strong Sell rating by MarketsMOJO, reflecting mounting concerns over profitability, leverage, and operational efficiency despite a backdrop of broader market gains. Time: 10 minutes ago

item.title: Omaxe Ltd Gains 6.57%: 4 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Momentum
item.description: Omaxe Ltd delivered a robust weekly performance, rising 6.57% from ₹74.44 to ₹79.33 between 2 and 6 February 2026, significantly outpacing the Sensex’s 1.51% gain over the same period. The stock’s trajectory was shaped by a series of technical shifts, a notable gap up on 4 February, and the release of challenging quarterly results, reflecting a complex interplay of market sentiment and operational realities. item.title: Sunshield Chemicals Declines 2.00% Amid Mixed Quarterly Results and Margin Pressures
